title: Rating Stars with Reviews
description: 5-star rating display with customizable reviews count and link
longDescription: A clean and professional star rating module perfect for displaying product reviews and ratings. Features five customizable star icons with dynamic text for rating score and review count. Includes a clickable link to reviews section. Fully responsive design with customizable colors, sizes, and text. Perfect for building trust and showcasing social proof on product pages.

variables.name: star_size
variables.label: Star Size

variables.description: Font size for regular text in pixels

variables.name: rating_text
variables.label: Rating Text
variables.description: Rating score text displayed before reviews link

variables.description: Text for the reviews count link

variables.description: URL or anchor link to reviews section
